note:
Clear. Concise. Classy.
We help kids who struggle in school.

name: IEP Audits
value: We audit your child's IEP with a fine tooth comb to find every mistake- and offer suggestions to remediate it!

name: IEP & ARD Facilitation
value: We attend IEP and ARD meetings as the advocate for the child. Parents attend as well, but the advocate conveys the required changes to the IEP.

name: Public Speaking, Workshops, Professional Development
value: We offer webinars, free online live events, workshops, and professional development to parents and school-based personnel.

name: Due Process, Stae and OCR Complaints
value: We are not attorneys, but can refer clients to attorneys when required. We also file state and federal OCR complaints.
